ygData.subject: everquest locations
ygData.msgSnippet: http://eq2.ogaming.com/forum/index.php? showtopic=12497&st=0&#entry133765 I tried to get some locations. They may or may not be mistakes. And the people don t
ygData.messageBody:
http://eq2.ogaming.com/forum/index.php?
showtopic=12497&st=0&#entry133765

I tried to get some locations. They may or may not be mistakes. And
the people don't stay in one place. note that some of these are red
monsters, be careful. if you use this info, please post my name
along with it. i would appreciate it. alot of work and death was
used for gaining this information. if i needs any corrections,
please feel free to post new information. thank you.

first numbers negative North positive South
second numbers negative East positive West
third number is elevation

--------------------------------------------

Antonica outside

central farmland house
-715.27 -16.25 220.63

mender dary buntan, you will need this cuz your armor will get
beaten up
guard hubbard, useful to run to for help
kinamer galemaul
darmen sproutmore
merchant addison
upstairs
merchants edwards, quigley and tanen danos
sighard sayer

some of the animals around here are orange. you can fight them with
three level twelve characters
